FlagsNZ,"2015-01-31T06:40:50.407Z","Introduce young engineers to this fantastic Technic set","

I believe that this set has all the core components of the Technic theme.
This set would be a great gift to a young LEGO civil engineer.
Box/Instructions
The box shows the three machines working together on a LEGO building site.
The yellow wheel loader is pushing boulders
column3: to collect which are then placed in the back of the blue and grey dump truck.

column1: The parts are separated into three numbered bags which align with the three instruction books.
Book number 1 builds the red excavator.
Book number 2 builds the blue and grey dump truck.
Book number 3 builds the yellow wheel loader.
Parts
This set has a good range of Technic parts. It includes two small linear actuators,
column2: one universal joint, a small turntable, small tracks, a small trench bucket and a small bulldozer

column1: There is a good selection of gears including some bevel gears.
LEGO Technic introduced a new I-Beam Frame and a new
column3: in 2014. This set has three I-Beams and one worm gear. This&nbsp
column4: worm gear is not listed in the inventory and the inventory and instruction book lists the old worm by mistake.

column1: The build
There are several Technic building techniques incorporated in this set.
Each model is a simple but extremely effective
column2: build. Enormous amounts of fun can be had driving the machines around, moving the&nbsp

column1: LEGO suggest
column2: that this set is suitable for young builders aged between 8 to 14 years old. I believe this set will be a great gift for a younger builder to introduce them into the Technic world.&nbsp

column1: The completed model
As this set makes up three construction crew machines, it allows for a mini building site to be created.
LEGO has a fourth scraper model PDF instructions. There is a slight adjustment required to accommodate the new worm gear which raises
Overall opinion

This set will not be a challenge for adults but would be a fantastic introduction to Technic gearing for younger builders. There is such a great range of Technic building techniques to show emerging engineers how machinery works.
Use this set as a stepping stone from traditional LEGO up to Technic for your younger builders.
